text: Mimocalothyrza speyeri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Hintz in 1919. It is known from the Ivory Coast and Cameroon.BioLib.cz - Mimocalothyrza speyeri. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1919
title: Mimocalothyrza speyeri
